caption.p: Manufacture of traditional “ zhourat” in Beirut. (A) boxes with herbal ingredients used in the “ zhourat” blend; (B) cinnamon ( Cinnamomum verum) is among the spices occasionally used in “ zhourat” blends; (C) Rosa damascena flower buds; (D) “ zhourat” bag from the Beirut herbal store showing the role of flowers as a source of color. Photos: (A), (B), (D), L. Attieh; (C), D. Rivera.
